channel.title: Taplist on Redtide Home Brewery
channel.description: Recent content in Taplist on Redtide Home Brewery

item.title: Puck Drop Porter
item.description: A dark, malty American style porter that is the base for many of our flavored beers.

item.title: Five Hole Kölsch
item.description: Our take on the beloved Kölsch style from the Köln area of Germany. A top-fermented ale, similar in style to a Pils or other lager. A clean, crisp, delicately-balanced beer usually with a very subtle fruit and hop character.

item.title: 51st State
item.description: A refreshing blonde ale inspired by Labatt 50.

item.title: Strawberry Milk Blonde
item.description: A blonde ale with lactose and strawberries from Fifers Orchards.

item.title: Almond Milk Stout
item.description: An English style Milk Stout with Disaronno amaretto.

item.title: Candi by Fordham and Dominion
item.description: Saaz and Hallertau hops provide a clean, floral aroma with minimal hop bitterness. Fruity/spicy flavors from the yeast are perfectly balanced with the sweetness of Belgian candy sugar. Notes of apricot and pear linger nicely against a dry finish.

item.title: Flanders Red
item.description: Inspired by the classic Flemish Red Ale, Heiress de Bourgogne is a deeply complex sour red ale with notes of raisins, dark stone fruits, and a delicate tartness. Utilizing the popular and unique kettle-souring method, Heiress will develop its tart, sour character in mere days instead of months or years without the risk of contaminating other batches. The resulting beer will mature rapidly into an elaborate menagerie of flavors, all bound within its deep ruby, medium-bodied elixir, and topped with a voluminous off-white head.

item.title: English Mild
item.description: A dark, low-gravity, malt-focused British session ale readily suited to drinking in quantity. Refreshing, yet flavorful, with a wide range of dark malt or dark sugar expression.

item.title: Cali Pale Ale
item.description: MoreBeers Sierra Nevada Pale Ale Clone

item.title: Juniper Saison
item.description: A refreshing Belgian style Saison made with cucumbers and juniper berries to invoke the flavors of Hendrick’s Gin.

item.title: On tap Next - Alsatian Pilsner
item.description: A SMaSH pilsner made with French Strisselspalt

item.title: On tap next - Mehn Family Lager
item.description: A SMaSH pilsner made with French Strisselspalt
